item.title: New working paper - Reaching for the stars?
item.description:
New paper on Optimal Distinctiveness and organizational learning!

I am happy to share our latest working paper on how content creators on YouTube learn from the feedback they get on their content releases. Check it out here.

item.title: New working paper - More than meets the eye?
item.description:
New paper on Optimal Distinctiveness and visual storytelling!

I am happy to share our latest working paper on how startups use product images in online b2c markets. Check it out here.

item.title: New working paper - Dancing to multiple tunes
item.description:
New paper on Optimal Distinctiveness & Cultural Entrepreneurship!

I am happy to share our latest working paper on how crowdfunding campaigns build legitimacy with new and returning backers. Check it out here.

item.title: New publication - Categorically right?
item.description:
New paper on Optimal Distinctiveness!

I am very excited to share that the first paper of my first PhD student Jonas has been accepted at Journal of Business Venturing. I am very happy for him and looking forward to publishing the other papers of his thesis with him in the near future. For the next two weeks you can follow the link and get a free copy of the paper here. Or check out the entry on my site here.
